titles.title: No Work, No Pay Act
No Work, No Pay Act
To impose a fine on Members of Congress in the event of a Government shutdown, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on House Administration, and in addition to the Committees on Oversight and Accountability, and Rules, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
